His Serene Highness 'Prince Hubertus of Hohenlohe-Langenburg' (born 2 February
1959 in Mexico City) is a Mexican Alpine skier, photographer, businessman, and a
pop singer known as 'Andy Himalaya' and 'Royal Disaster'. He is descended from
the reigning dynasty of a former principality in what is now Germany.
